Printer can be used as a speaker. You can place your phone on top of the printer and it can be used as a speaker. This is because the printer has a flat surface on top which is perfect for placing a phone.
Printer can be used as a paperweight. You can place it on top of a stack of papers to keep them in place.
Printer can be used as a bookmark. You can use the flat surface on top of the printer to keep your place in a book.
Printer can be used as a doorstop. You can place it in front of a door to keep it from opening.
Printer can be used as a step stool. You can use it to reach high places.
